name: LetterboxdLog
description: Log your Jellyfin playback to Letterboxd.
overview: Syncs your Jellyfin watch history to Letterboxd, supporting anti-bot measures and raw cookies.

versions.changelog:
- fix: definitively fix manifest structure and workflow keys (689607b)
- fix: use jq --arg for robust manifest updates (88bbbd6)
- fix: correct JSON syntax in publish workflow (d2ba96e)
- fix: restore and refine logging and rewatch logic v1 (c495441)

- fix: Correctly include response body in logs for diary entry errors.
- fix: Refine tag formatting for better compatibility.
- fix: Restore rewatch tag management (reverted by mistake).

- feat: Add detailed error logging for diary entry failures.
- fix: Robust removal of .ignore and LetterboxdSkip tags on rewatch detection.
- fix(sync): Ensure LetterboxdSkip tag is saved to NFO when .ignore is found (c0bfea8)
- fix(ci): Upgrade release action to softprops/action-gh-release@v2 (fix set-output warning) and bump to v1.10.2 (0aed0d9)

- fix(ci): Add version collision detection to auto-bump logic (a615f7e)
- fix(ci): Standardize version control (remove CSPROJ version) and harden git push workflow (4deccff)
- fix(ci): Use explicit refspec for git push to avoid detached HEAD error (128) (424ea60)
- fix(ci): Target specific project in dotnet publish to avoid solution-level output error (e46351c)
- fix(ci): Update publish workflow to use correct DLL name and sync Directory.Build.props (0231ac4)
- Refactor: Fix build errors, StyleCop warnings, add ignore logic, and bump version to 1.9.2.0 (5da0ed6)
Fix: Compatibility update for Jellyfin 10.11.x (EFCore/User changes).
